name: Off 2 highland, cuz HCM's 2 mainstream.
description: 5 hours from HCM City & 2 hours from Da Lat city, Bao Loc is a peaceful city full of wonders which is gifted with amazing lakes & falls, where you can experience a complete various of street food, blend yourself in the strong coffee taste, enjoy fresh air at vast mulberry & tea hills or just simply sit back and relax.
